name: Help Me The Game
description:
hey if you say this is a virus you will suffer in my eyes

and theres 2 endings

no more endings

unless you make your own

why u actin sus

made with ClickTeam Fusion 2.5

you can publish your video to me at the comment section

yes you have full permision to make a video

How to make a custom ending

1. make a copy of the app

2. change the button text

3. change the original text

4. enjoy your mod!

we have a website! https://sites.google.com/view/guyisguy/home

also there is a secret website using the the search bar

The Extra Ending is not a update idk why       -one of the stupid devs
